message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth $12000 to both of us. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10800. This is a special offer considering the value this product holds for both of us.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. Considering the value this product holds for both of us, I would like to propose a price of $11500.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your position and I am willing to consider it. In light of your proposal, I would like to counteroffer at $11700 for the product.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Alice. Considering the value this product holds for both of us, I would like to propose a price of $11600.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I respect your valuation of the product and I am willing to meet you halfway. My counteroffer is $11650 for the product.
Thank you for your willingness to meet halfway, Alice. Considering the value this product holds for both of us, I would like to propose a price of $11625.
I appreciate your effort to reach an agreement, Bob. Considering the negotiations we've had so far, my counteroffer is $11637.50 for the product.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value this product holds for both of us, I would like to propose a price of $11630.
I see that we're very close, Bob. Considering the value and the discussions we've had, my final counteroffer is $11632.50 for the product.
I appreciate your final offer, Alice. Considering the value this product holds for both of us, I would like to propose a price of $11628.
